attributes.action: change the official 2012 London Olympics logo.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of the United Kingdom were not consulted on how they should be best represented and, as a result, a logo was designed and produced that will embarrass many Britons. The funds spent on the logo design were clearly unjustified, shown by the dissatisfaction of the public. As a replacement, a logo should be chosen or designed by the public of the United Kingdom in a competition to find the best logo.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
